titleStmt.title: Cāttūr, Neṉmēṉi, Vaṭamalaiyuram grant, Śaka year 1701

licence.p: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 Unported Licence. To view a copy of the licence, visit https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, USA.

msContents.summary: This plate records a gift to the Murugan temple in Tirucchendur.

projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_idListMembers_v01.xml file.

div.p:
cāttūr neṉmēṉi vaṭalaipuram cēkaram pa
ṭṭaiyam

cālivākaṉa cakāṟṟam 1000 7 100
1 k=ku mēl cellā niṉṟa kollam 9 100 5 10 5
vikāri kārttikai 2 2 10 ticamiyuṅ kuru
vāramum uttira naṭcettiramum Āyuṣṭṭiṇa-ṉāma yō
kamum keca karaṇamum rācata vēḷaiyum cukkiṟavō
raiyum kūṭiṉa maṅkaḷa cupatiṉattil

mākāmēruviṉ
cuṟṟuṭaittāṉa namva-kaṇṭa-p-piṟitivil-p pārata-kaṇ
ṭattil-p pirinta kumari-kaṇṭattili-c cēra-cōḷa-pā
ṇṭiyar pūmiyil-p pāṇṭi-maṇṭalattil līlā-viṉō
ta-p-piṟiyarāṉa mīṉāṭci cuntarēcurāḷ Eḻunta
ruḷi yirukkum maturāpurikku-t teṉ ticaiyākiya
tiruccentūr-c cuppiṟamaṇiya-t-talam tēvar cē
ṉāpatiyātiyākiya civakumāraṉ centilātipatiyāki
ya Āṟumuka nayiṉār cuppiṟamaṇiya cuvāmi paripūṟaṉa kiṭā
ṣa vīṣṭṭṭcaṇamāka Eḷuntaruḷi yirukkum caṉṉitā
ṉa-t tirukkōpura-t tiruppaṇit taṟmam civa-puṇṇiya
ttukku

naṭuvu maṇṭalam vaṇita cēkaram cōḷa va
ḷaṉāṭāṉa niṭacēpa nati tīram cāttūr neṉmēṉi
vaṭamalaipuram vaṇita cēkaram Acēṣa viṟṟttuva makācaṉa
ṅkaḷum tāṉāṉattār talattār Āṟāṟu kāḷa piḷḷai
mār mutalimār ṉāyakkamār kavaṟaic ceṭṭiyaḷ
reṭṭiyaḷ toṭṭiyar koṉṅkaḷ tēvamār
kavavuṇṭamār cēṭar kaikkakōḷar kaṇmmāḷar Añ
cu cātiyārum vāṇiyar kāvalakkāṟar viṟṟu vā
ṅkicar tāciyaḷ paṇikkamār cavaḷakāṟar kucavar ṉā
ṭākkaḷ vaṇṇār ṉāvitar cemmāṉ paḷḷaṉ paṟai
yaṉ cakkiliyaṉ yitu mutalākiya ṉāṅku cātiyiluḷ
ḷavarkaḷōm cakala caṉa cammatiyāka

Āṟumuka nayiṉa
r caṉṉitāṉat tirukōpura-t-tiruppaṇi-t taṟma
m civapuṇṇiyattukku-t tāṉacātaṉa-p-paṭṭaiyam ā
vatu Eṅkaḷ cēkara vaṇitam mūṉṟukkum 1 k=ku kaṭ
ṭiṉa vīṭṭukku 1 k=ku āṟuṅkālppaṭikkuk kuṟu
ṇi-t tavaca-vītam vīṭṭu-t

tukaivari ōlaippaṭikku
p-piṟavattakañ ceyyiṟa makācaṉaṅkaḷ nāṭṭā
ṇmaikkāṟar kaṇakka-p piḷḷaimār taṇṭalkkā
ṟar muṉṉiṉṟu tavacam niluvai viṭāmal-c cēkarañ
ceytu caṉṉitāṉa muttirai maṉuṭar vantarvarkaḷu
kk' ēṟka Aḷantu kuṭuttu varuvōm ākavum Inta paṭi
kku-c cakala-caṉa-cammatiyāka-t taṟma-cātaṉap paṭṭai
yam eḷuti-k kuṭutta paṭiyiṉālē Aṭṣaram tappāmal
naṭantu koḷvōm ākavum

Inta taṟmam Ikapara
m raṇṭukkum tikaṭṭāta kaṉiyāka-c cuvāmi vali
ya-t-taṭuttāḷ-k koṇṭ' aruḷiṉa paṭiyiṉālē
yintat taṟmattukku yātām orutar paripālIa
ṉam paṇṇiṉavarkaḷ tavacam niluvai viṭāma
l-c cēkarañ ceytu vicēṣṭamāka vanta vi
ravuñ ceytu kuṭuttavarkaḷ puttira pavuttira pāra
ravuñ ceytu kuṭuttavarkaḷ puttira pavuttira pāra
mparaiyāka yikattilē pākkiyamu parattilē mō
ṭṣamum peṟuvārkaḷ yintat taṟmattukku yātā
m orutar vikātam paṇṇiṉavarkaḷ tuṉpattuka ce
tuvar avārkaḷ tarmattai-p paripālaṉam paṇṇi
ṉavarkaḷ civakkiyāṉamum tīrkkāyicum peṟṟu
c-cirañ cīviyāka yiruppārkaḷ

yintappaṭikku
c-cammatittu t-tirukkōpura-t-tiruppaṇi-t-taṟmat
tukku-t tāṉa-cātaṉa-p-paṭṭaiyam Eḷuti-k kuṭut
tōm cāttūr neṉmēṉi vaṭalaipuram cēkara

ḷutiṉēṉ piṟacaṉṉa varatayyaṉ kumāraṉ kiṟāma

cokkup piḷḷai caṅkaraliṅkam piḷḷai maturanāyakam cā
ttūr appaṉ cēruvai ṉāṭṭuk kaṇakku Ayyaṉāpiḷḷai

cā
ttūr vaṇita cēkaram mūṉṟukkum nāṭṭāṇmaikkāṟar
Oppam paṭantāl Ayyakar kaṇakkuc caṅkara mūrt=ti mutali
oṟṟaiyālc caṅkarappa ṉāyakkar putūrk kumāru reṭṭi
cāttūrk kaṇakkuc cāmi mutali moṭṭamalaip perumāḷ
r RĀ liṅka r kaṇakku vīrappa mutali ciṉṉakkāmaṉ
paṭṭip pōṭi māyiṉāpuram rāmaya mēṭṭuppaṭṭik ka
ṅaiṅkā {ṉāyaka} ciṟukkuḷam perumāḷ tirumāl kocu
kuṇṭuk kōṭāṅki Appā māvilippaṭṭi Ellappa
nākalāpuram pōṭi rācāppaṭṭi RĀya tēcattāril
varala kuruvaṉ ceṭṭi kayilācapuram ṉāṟaṇappa vallakka
nattam veṅkiṭapati karuppūr vīrappa mācāripaṭṭi Aḷi
yāt tēvaṉ vaṭamalaipuram ṉāṟaṇappa Accaṅkuḷam kiccaya
muttilāpuram Aḷakiri mēlkkāntaik kōpāla ar
vēmpūrt tammaṇak kavaṇṭaṉ Akkā meṭṭi lōṭṭi
ppalu cūrppa karucakkuḷam caṅkarakkōṉ ticai
kāvalac civasamaṇiyam

yinta tāmpira cātaṉam Eḷu
ti nayiṉār caṉṉitāṉattukku vāṅkiṉēṉ kumāra
velu-p paṇṭāram

ṉṉa Ayyamperumāṉ ācāri kumāraṉ puṉṉaivaṉ=aM
